item.title: Starmer backs down in farm tax row - but why now?
item.description: A U-turn on inheritance tax plans for farmers raises more questions about political judgement in government.

item.title: BP sells stake in motor oil arm Castrol for $6bn
item.description: BP has sold a 65% stake in its motor lubricant arm Castrol to US-based investment firm Stonepeak.

item.title: Zelensky moves towards demilitarised zones in latest peace plan for Ukraine
item.description: On the key question of Ukraine's eastern Donbas, Zelensky says a "free economic zone" is a potential option.

item.title: Does religion have a role to play in sport?
item.description: Athletes and footballers tell us if talking about their faith impacts how they are treated in sport.

item.title: Venezuela accuses US of 'extortion' over seizure of oil tankers
item.description: An emergency meeting of the UN Security Council was called to discuss the US seizure of two tankers.
